object.name: non_indigenous_species
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema" i18n:domain="plone"> <schema> <fieldset name="nis" label="Non indigenous species"> <field name="nis_species_name_original" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Scientific name</description> <required>True</required> <title>Species name original</title> </field> <field name="nis_species_name_accepted" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Unique Scientific name - corrected based on the latest accepted (official) species name</description> <required>True</required> <title>Species name accepted</title> </field> <field name="nis_scientificname_accepted" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Short unique Scientific name</description> <required>True</required> <title>Scientific name accepted</title> </field> <field name="nis_list" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <required>False</required> <title>List</title> <values> <element>MSFD</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_subregion" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>MSFD sub-region</description> <required>False</required> <title>Subregion</title> <values> <element>Adriatic Sea</element> <element>Aegean-Levantine Sea</element> <element>Baltic Sea</element> <element>Bay of Biscay and the Iberian Coast</element> <element>Black Sea</element> <element>Celtic Seas</element> <element>Greater North Sea, incl. the Kattegat and the English Channel</element> <element>Ionian Sea and the Central Mediterranean Sea</element> <element>Macaronesia</element> <element>Western Mediterranean Sea</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_region" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>MSFD Region</description> <required>False</required> <title>Region</title> <values> <element>Baltic Sea</element> <element>Black Sea</element> <element>Mediterranean Sea</element> <element>North-East Atlantic</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_country" type="zope.schema.List"> <description>Country of introduction/collection/detection</description> <required>False</required> <title>Country</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Austria</element> <element>Belgium</element> <element>Bulgaria</element> <element>Croatia</element> <element>Cyprus</element> <element>Czechia</element> <element>Denmark</element> <element>Estonia</element> <element>Finland</element> <element>France</element> <element>Germany</element> <element>Greece</element> <element>Hungary</element> <element>Iceland</element> <element>Ireland</element> <element>Italy</element> <element>Latvia</element> <element>Lithuania</element> <element>Luxembourg</element> <element>Malta</element> <element>Netherlands</element> <element>Norway</element> <element>Poland</element> <element>Portugal</element> <element>Romania</element> <element>Slovakia</element> <element>Slovenia</element> <element>Spain</element> <element>Sweden</element> <element>United Kingdom</element> <element>Albania</element> <element>Bosnia and Herzegovina</element> <element>Kosovo</element> <element>Liechtenstein</element> <element>Montenegro</element> <element>North Macedonia</element> <element>Serbia</element> <element>Switzerland</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="nis_status_comment" type="zope.schema.Text"> <required>False</required> <title>Status comment</title> </field> <field name="nis_status" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <required>False</required> <title>Status</title> <values> <element>non-indigenous</element> <element>cryptogenic</element> <element>partly native</element> <element>native/partly native</element> <element>range expanding</element> <element>absent</element> <element>data deficient</element> <element>questionable</element> <element>NA</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_group" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <required>False</required> <title>Group</title> <values> <element>Primary producer</element> <element>Invertebrate</element> <element>Vertebrate</element> <element>pathogen/parasite</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_ver_inv_pp" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <required>False</required> <title>VER-INV-PP</title> <values> <element>PP</element> <element>PP/Micro</element> <element>PP/Patho</element> <element>INV</element> <element>INV/Patho</element> <element>VER</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_taxonomy" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Taxonomic group based on Scientific name</description> <required>False</required> <title>Taxonomy</title> </field> <field name="nis_ns_stand" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Year of introduction in Europe's seas or Region - based on first detection/collection date</description> <required>False</required> <title>NS stand</title> </field> <field name="nis_year" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Year of first detection/reported in sub-region/country</description> <required>False</required> <title>Year</title> </field> <field name="nis_period" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Period</title> <values> <element><1970</element> <element>1970-1975</element> <element>1976-1981</element> <element>1982-1987</element> <element>1988-1993</element> <element>1994-1999</element> <element>2000-2005</element> <element>2006-2011</element> <element>2012-2017</element> <element>2018-2023</element> <element>2024-</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_area" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Sub-region code</description> <required>False</required> <title>Area</title> </field> <field name="nis_rel" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - release in nature (REL), including intentional release of aquarium species</description> <required>False</required> <title>REL</title> </field> <field name="nis_ec" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - escape from confinement (EC), referring to the accidental escape or unintentional release of aquarium species</description> <required>False</required> <title>EC</title> </field> <field name="nis_tc" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - transport-contaminant (TC), including contaminants on animals (except parasites, species transported by host/vector) and parasites on animals (including species transported by host and vector)</description> <required>False</required> <title>TC</title> </field> <field name="nis_ts_other" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - transport-stowaway (TS) through other means of transport (TS-other)</description> <required>False</required> <title>TS-Other</title> </field> <field name="nis_ts_ball" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - transport-stowaway (TS), through ship/boat ballast water (TS-ballasts)</description> <required>False</required> <title>TS-ball</title> </field> <field name="nis_ts_hull" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - transport-stowaway (TS), through ship/boat hull fouling (TS-hull)</description> <required>False</required> <title>TS-hull</title> </field> <field name="nis_cor" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - corridor (COR), referring to interconnected waterways/basins/seas (in the current context, this refers to the Suez Canal and human-made canals)</description> <required>False</required> <title>COR</title> </field> <field name="nis_una" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - unaided (UNA), secondary spread, as appropriate</description> <required>False</required> <title>UNA</title> </field> <field name="nis_unk" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Pathway - unknown (UNK)</description> <required>False</required> <title>UNK</title> </field> <field name="nis_total" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>sum of pathways</description> <required>False</required> <title>Total</title> </field> <field name="nis_pathway_probability" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Pathway_Probability</title> <values> <element>P_HIGH</element> <element>P_MED</element> <element>P_LOW</element> </values> </field> <field name="nis_comment" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Comment</title> </field> <field name="nis_source" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Source</title> </field> <field name="nis_remarks" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Remarks</title> </field> <field name="nis_taxon_comment" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Taxon_comment</title> </field> <field name="nis_checked_by" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Checked by</title> </field> <field name="nis_checked_on" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Checked on</title> </field> <field name="nis_check_comment" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Checked comment</title> </field> <field name="nis_assigned_to" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description></description> <required>False</required> <title>Assigned to</title> <vocabulary>nis_experts_vocabulary</vocabulary> </field> </fieldset> </schema> </model>
